name: passing space
description:
passing space

Author/Designer: mogar

set on the fringes of space in a ship that fled Earth thirty-three years ago, PASSING SPACE is a short game with its eyes on escape, loneliness, and mortality.

this project explores the potential development of a relationship between the human and the machine, and a person's tendency to  develop, tell stories, and share opinions as if something mechanical is alive. no matter what the player does, GIOTEXT ver. 4.04.5 has their back; the only question is, will they offer the same?

maybe they will, maybe they won't. either way, the two of you are two little specks in the ever-fleeting passing space.
